trans-unit.source: Create a virtual machine running Windows in Azure
trans-unit.target: Create a virtual machine running Windows in Azure

trans-unit.source: Create a Windows virtual machine in the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: Create a Windows virtual machine in the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: Create a virtual machine running Windows in the Azure portal
trans-unit.target: Create a virtual machine running Windows in the Azure portal

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.SELECTOR]
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.SELECTOR]

trans-unit.source: Azure preview portal
trans-unit.target: Azure preview portal

trans-unit.source: Azure portal
trans-unit.target: Azure portal

trans-unit.source: PowerShell: Resource Manager deployment
trans-unit.target: PowerShell: Resource Manager deployment

trans-unit.source: PowerShell: Classic deployment
trans-unit.target: PowerShell: Classic deployment

trans-unit.source: This tutorial shows you how easy it is to create an Azure virtual machine (VM) in the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial shows you how easy it is to create an Azure virtual machine (VM) in the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: We'll use a Windows Server image as an example, but that's just one of the many images Azure offers.
trans-unit.target: We'll use a Windows Server image as an example, but that's just one of the many images Azure offers.

trans-unit.source: Note that your image choices depend on your subscription.
trans-unit.target: Note that your image choices depend on your subscription.

trans-unit.source: For example, desktop images may be available to MSDN subscribers.
trans-unit.target: For example, desktop images may be available to MSDN subscribers.

trans-unit.source: You can also create VMs using [your own images](virtual-machines-create-upload-vhd-windows-server.md).
trans-unit.target: You can also create VMs using [your own images](virtual-machines-create-upload-vhd-windows-server.md).

trans-unit.source: To learn about this and other methods, see [Different ways to create a Windows virtual machine](virtual-machines-windows-choices-create-vm.md).
trans-unit.target: To learn about this and other methods, see [Different ways to create a Windows virtual machine](virtual-machines-windows-choices-create-vm.md).

trans-unit.source: Video walkthrough
trans-unit.target: Video walkthrough

trans-unit.source: Here's a walkthrough of this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: Here's a walkthrough of this tutorial.

trans-unit.source: How to create the virtual machine
trans-unit.target: How to create the virtual machine

trans-unit.source: This section shows you how to use the **From Gallery** option in the Azure portal to create the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: This section shows you how to use the **From Gallery** option in the Azure portal to create the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: This option provides more configuration choices than the **Quick Create** option.
trans-unit.target: This option provides more configuration choices than the **Quick Create** option.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to join a virtual machine to a virtual network, you'll need to use the **From Gallery** option.
trans-unit.target: For example, if you want to join a virtual machine to a virtual network, you'll need to use the **From Gallery** option.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You can also try the richer, customizable [Azure preview portal](https://portal.azure.com) to create a virtual machine, use enhanced monitoring and diagnostics, use Premium storage, and more.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You can also try the richer, customizable [Azure preview portal](https://portal.azure.com) to create a virtual machine, use enhanced monitoring and diagnostics, use Premium storage, and more.

trans-unit.source: The available options for configuring a virtual machine in the two portals overlap substantially but aren't identical.
trans-unit.target: The available options for configuring a virtual machine in the two portals overlap substantially but aren't identical.

trans-unit.source: For example, use the preview portal to configure a virtual machine with Premium storage.
trans-unit.target: For example, use the preview portal to configure a virtual machine with Premium storage.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: Log on to the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: Log on to the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: For instructions, see [How to log on to a virtual machine running Windows Server](virtual-machines-log-on-windows-server.md).
trans-unit.target: For instructions, see [How to log on to a virtual machine running Windows Server](virtual-machines-log-on-windows-server.md).

trans-unit.source: Attach a disk to store data.
trans-unit.target: Attach a disk to store data.

trans-unit.source: You can attach both empty disks and disks that contain data.
trans-unit.target: You can attach both empty disks and disks that contain data.

trans-unit.source: For instructions, see the [Attach a data disk tutorial](storage-windows-attach-disk.md).
trans-unit.target: For instructions, see the [Attach a data disk tutorial](storage-windows-attach-disk.md).

trans-unit.source: Additional resources
trans-unit.target: Additional resources

trans-unit.source: To learn more about what you can configure for a virtual machine and when you can do it, see [About Azure VM configuration settings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn763935.aspx).
trans-unit.target: To learn more about what you can configure for a virtual machine and when you can do it, see [About Azure VM configuration settings](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn763935.aspx).
